attributes.action: Prosecute under 16s that break the law by having sex which results in underage pregnancy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What message are we sending to young people? If it is illegal to have sex under 16 why are these young mothers and fathers not punished with the full force of the law. Instead we give them housing, money and sympathy. Sex education is better than it ever has been , lets get tough and actually have a deterrant to getting pregnant not incentives.
